name: Juiz User Log-in by email
author: Geoffrey Crofte

sections.description:
Since WordPress 4.5, that feature is included in the Core. You don’t need this plugin anymore. Thank you all for support.

Adds the possibility for users to log in with its email address OR its username.
Uses native WordPress functions.
Lightweight plugin, no options, just activate it and it works!

sections.installation:
You can use one of both method :

Installation via your WordPress website

  1. Go to the admin menu ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Install’ and search for ‘User login by email’
  2. Click ‘install’ and activate it
  3. That’s all for you!

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin (it’s better :p)
  2. Unzip juiz-user-login-by-email folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Go to your WP admin panel to “Appearance > Plugins” and activate
  4. That’s all for you!
